variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 2.00% on the portion of income up to $10,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 4.50% on the portion of income over $10,000 up to $50,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 5.50% on the portion of income over $50,000 up to $100,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 6.00% on the portion of income over $100,000 up to $200,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 6.50% on the portion of income over $200,000 up to $250,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 6.90% on the portion of income over $250,000 up to $500,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 6.99% on the portion of income over $500,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_7 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all seven brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
